Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities  Good hands on Exp. in-3+ Years exp. in Python core(MRO-Method Resolution Order, Method Overloading, Operator Overloading, Decorators)No SQL(MongoDB)AWS(Lambda, API gateway, SQS, Cloud Watch, S3) Back-end development in PythonSupport the full range of day-to-day priorities of the team, primarily focused on software design, and development of existing and new functionalities in the domain of cyber securityContribute to testing, documenting, supporting build systems, interacting with stakeholders, etc. as needed on a small team.You will be proficient with SQL, database design and designing data structures that perform well under scale and load.Must be self-directed and capable of working effectively in a highly collaborative and fast paced small team environment.Must be effective working in less structured, smaller team environments, taking responsibility for helping define requirements and rapidly prototyping ideas.Must be able to communicate well with technical and non-technical audiences.You should be a creative problem-solver who demonstrates a clear and thoughtful approaches to challenging technical problems that solve real business needs.
